Method Detail

createTreeBlock

TreeBlock createTreeBlock(OTUs otus)
Creates a tree block associated with the provided OTUs (i.e. any nodes in any trees and networks inside the block that reference OTU objects, must refer to members of the provided OTUs object)

Parameters:
otus - an OTUs block to refer to
Returns:
a newly created tree block

createOTUs

OTUs createOTUs()
Creates a new taxa block

Returns:
a newly created taxa block

createCategoricalMatrix

CategoricalMatrix createCategoricalMatrix(OTUs otus)
Creates a new categorical character matrix, i.e. a matrix of type Standard*. All rows in the matrix must refer to an OTU from the provided taxa block

Parameters:
otus - a taxa block
Returns:
a character state matrix

createContinuousMatrix

ContinuousMatrix createContinuousMatrix(OTUs otus)
Creates a new continuous character matrix, i.e. a matrix of type Continuous*. All rows in the matrix must refer to an OTU from the provided taxa block

Parameters:
otus - a taxa block
Returns:
a character state matrix

createMolecularMatrix

MolecularMatrix createMolecularMatrix(OTUs otus,
                                      java.lang.String type)
Creates a new molecular character matrix, i.e. a matrix of type DNA|RNA|Protein*. All rows in the matrix must refer to an OTU from the provided taxa block

Parameters:
otus - a taxa block
Returns:
a character state matrix

getOTUsList

java.util.List<OTUs> getOTUsList()
Returns a list of all taxa blocks inside the document.

getMatrices

java.util.List<Matrix<?>> getMatrices()
Returns a list of all matrices inside the document.

getTreeBlockList

java.util.List<TreeBlock> getTreeBlockList()
Returns a list of all tree blocks inside the document.

getXmlString

java.lang.String getXmlString()
Returns a NeXML serialization of the document.
